testcase.name: Verify if AddPlaceApi and GetPlaceApi functionality is working by adding place and checking that's added
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "Tom" "English" "World cross center"..........passed When user calls "AddPlaceApi" with "POST" http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And verify place_Id created maps to "Tom" using "GetPlaceApi"...............passed

testcase.name: Verify if AddPlaceApi and GetPlaceApi functionality is working by adding place and checking that's added 2
testcase.system-out: Given Add Place Payload with "John" "Spanish" "Toronto"....................passed When user calls "AddPlaceApi" with "POST" http request......................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And verify place_Id created maps to "John" using "GetPlaceApi"..............passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete place functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given DeletePlace Payload...................................................passed When user calls "DeletePlaceApi" with "POST" http request...................passed Then the API call got success with status code 200..........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
